short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clip images from the web and use them in your projects

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Used to create a product at minimum or user can save Product or Invoice Line Item in a salesforce organisation a App is connected too. The Product image can be clipped from the web page, the Webclipper is on and can save as Product image.
